meaning: to fuck / damn / fuck it (strong vulgar)
fucked in the ass / cocksucker (very offensive)
to fuck in the ass / sodomize (verb)
fuck your mother in the ass
fucker of your dead (extreme ancestral insult)
son of a whore / bastard (very offensive)
